com.paypal.selion.reports.reporter.services

Class ReporterDateFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.reports.reporter.services.ReporterDateFormatter

  • public class ReporterDateFormatter
extends Object
    This class is responsible for providing formatting helpers to JSON generator, Runtime Reporter and HTML Reporter to help parse and display the report data in appropriate format in each of their report formats.

    • Method Detail

      • getISO8601String

        public static String getISO8601String(Date date)
        Return an ISO 8601 combined date and time string for specified date/time in host machine's default time zone.
        Parameters:
        date - Date
        Returns:
        String with format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS+XXXX where XXXX corresponds to the host's time zone."

      • getISO8601StringWithSpecificTimeZone

        public static String getISO8601StringWithSpecificTimeZone(Date date,
                                          TimeZone zone)
        Return an ISO 8601 combined date and time string for specified date/time. The returned date and time format is compatible with JavaScript on Internet Explorer.
        Parameters:
        date - Date
        zone - Time zone to be used.
        Returns:
        String with format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX" where XXX corresponds to the input time zone. example: UTC time is represented as '2015-01-21T02:21:33.955Z' example: PST time is represented as '2015-01-20T18:21:33.955-08:00'

      • getStringFromISODateString

        public static String getStringFromISODateString(String dateISOString)
        Return an reader friendly date from ISO 8601 combined date and time string.
        Parameters:
        dateISOString - String for date in ISO format.
        Returns:
        String with format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS+XXXX where XXXX corresponds to the host's time zone."

      • formatReportDataForBrowsableReports

        public static Map.Entry<String,String> formatReportDataForBrowsableReports(Map.Entry<String,String> entryItem)
        Formats specific keys and values into readable form for HTML Reporter.
        Parameters:
        entryItem - A single key value Entry to be formatted.
        Returns:
        The formatted key value Entry or the original Entry, if no formatting is required
